name: SpaceMan Platformer
description:
The idea for this game was that you play as a spaceman who works at the Oil Oasis, in which your job is to travel to other nearby islands to fill up the Oil Oasis express vending machines. A demo/Test of this game where I worked with friends can be seen in my other projects.

I made this level of the game my final university project, as this was a learning experience for me to teach myself how to make character models intended to be animated, experiment with animations as well as learn UE4 blueprint to get a better understanding of the engine when working with 3D assets. 

This has helped me have better practice when making as well as exporting assets, such as correctly working with centre points and scales of the assets I create.

All 3D assets are seen in this project I made myself, as well as the small amount of blueprint making the menu screens work and the character movement.

Animations were sourced from Mixamo.com.

Skybox from UNEASY Games - Blueprints (found in the unreal engine asset store)

You can find my other 3D work at www.artstation.com/saulkinslow.

Thank you!
